properties.address: 1 Lower Street, Cleobury Mortimer, Shropshire DY14 8BN
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 6th November 2023** We cater for anyone that walks through our doors! We have a free soup lunch every Monday between 12:30pm-2pm. This is available for anyone... Working from home, Who fancies soup for lunch, Who home educates, Who hasn't spoken to anyone on that day, Who needs a different environment for lunch... etc, etc.
properties.title: Cleobury Community Hub

properties.description: We have a social space in our building where you are welcome to come and sit and have a chat. The Space serves subsidised refreshments and a warm welcome.
properties.title: The Social Space
